name: Translucent Image
description: For the first 5 sec of Fade, you take <dynamic>(-- 5)% - (-- 15)%</dynamic> reduced damage.

name: Move with Grace
description: Levitate grants <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic> increased movement speed.

name: Clear Mind
description: Dispel Magic, Purify, and Mass Dispel cost <dynamic>20.0% - 35%</dynamic> less mana.

name: Charitable Soul
description: Casting Power Word: Shield on an ally also shields you for <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic> of the amount for 10 sec.

name: Light's Inspiration
description: Desperate Prayer heals you for an additional <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic> of your maximum health over 5 sec.

name: Power Unto Others
description: Power Infusion incurs a <dynamic>5.0 sec - 20 sec</dynamic> reduced cooldown when you cast it on an ally.

name: Shining Radiance
description: Power Word: Radiance's healing is increased by <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic>.

name: Pain Transformation
description: Pain Suppression also heals your target for <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic> of their maximum health.

name: Exaltation
description: Rapture's duration is increased by 2.0 sec, and its Power Word: Shield enhancement is increased by <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Lasting Spirit
description: Guardian Spirit's duration is increased by 2.0 sec, and it increases healing received by an additional <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Swift Penitence
description: The damage or healing of your first bolt of Penance is increased by <dynamic>15.0% - 36%</dynamic>.

name: Focused Mending
description: Prayer of Mending does <dynamic>20.0% - 50%</dynamic> increased healing to the initial target.

name: Resonant Words
description: Casting a Holy Word spell increases the healing of your next Heal or Flash Heal by <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic>.

name: Mental Recovery
description:
After 

<condition>Mind Bomb</condition>
<dynamic>Mind Bomb</dynamic>

Psychic Scream ends, affected targets' movement speed is reduced by <dynamic>40.0%</dynamic> for 5 sec.

name: Courageous Ascension
description: Ascended Blast deals <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic> increased damage, and Ascended Eruption deals an additional 1% damage per stack of Boon of the Ascended.

name: Festering Transfusion
description: Unholy Transfusion lasts 5 sec longer and deals <dynamic>10.0% - 25%</dynamic> more damage and healing.

name: Fae Fermata
description: The duration of Fae Guardians is increased by <dynamic>5.0 sec - 20 sec</dynamic>.

name: Shattered Perceptions
description: Mindgames lasts an additional 3.0 sec and deals an additional <dynamic>20.0% - 35%</dynamic> damage or healing.

name: Haunting Apparitions
description: Your Shadowy Apparitions deal <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic> more damage.

name: Mind Devourer
description: Mind Blast deals <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic> increased damage and has a 10% chance to make your next Devouring Plague cost no insanity.

name: Rabid Shadows
description:
Your 

<condition>Mindbender</condition>
<dynamic>Mindbender</dynamic>

Shadowfiend's attack speed is increased by 20%, and it deals <dynamic>10.0%</dynamic> more damage.

name: Dissonant Echoes
description:
While not in Void Form, Mind Flay has a <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic> chance to allow you to cast Void Bolt. 
While in Void Form, Void Bolt has a <dynamic>5.0%</dynamic> chance to reset the cooldown on Void Bolt.

name: Holy Oration
description: Spells that reduce the cooldowns of your Holy Words reduce them by <dynamic>5.0% - 20%</dynamic> more.
